thought: In order to craft a light_gray_wool, I need to craft a light_gray_dye and combine it with a white_wool. Therefore, I will start by crafting the white_wool. White wool requires 4 string in a 2x2 square, so I will start by moving one of the strings into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
